website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking antenna that does an adequate job of picking up HD channels, with the added convenience of remote positioning.
pros: Remote-controlled rotor makes fine-tuning antenna’s direction incredibly convenient
Responsive tech support and good manufacturer service
Mounts easily to most antenna masts
cons: Reception is well below advertised 150-mile range, by as much as half as far, for some owners
Plastic parts are not as durable as metal antennas

customer_reviews.title: F-Type coax
customer_reviews.text: I I think it's important to point out that the unit has proprietary coax adapters. In other words, you cannot plug regular F-Type coax directly into the unit without the company supplied adapters. When tightening one of the adapters, it actually broke therefore my unit is presently unusable. This is the adapter required to add additional coax if you're running longer cord. UPDATE: Customer service from the seller promptly contacted me and resolved the issue. I'm satisfied with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Full Metal

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN THE INSIDE FLAT-PANEL TYPE ANTENNA!!  WAAAY BETTER.
customer_reviews.text: YES! WAAAAY BETTER THAN ANY OF THE "FLAT" TYPE [INSIDE] HDTV ANTENNA's! ...ANY! I KNOW - Ive TRIED THEM "ALL". {wasted tons of $$$, too} BEST $36 Ive ever spent (on an Antenna). GET IT! BUY IT... FORGET about the inside FLAT type forever. PS: Put mine in the window -just to test. Havent even mounted OUTSIDE properly yet - and all "sifting", blink-outs, "no signal" B.S. - GONE! wow. Cant wait to mount properly, for even BETTER signal. Even rain doesnt affect now! Before? weather a little bad?? Forget about watching TV! very frustrating. With this antenna, even changing channels - MUCH faster now! Like I said... {for jsut $36? BEST DEAL around!}
customer_reviews.author: DOWBAY!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Manhatten apartment
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment in Manhattan. After I cut the cord I needed a rotating antenna inside the apartment because the landlord forbids roof antennas. I bought a rotor and antenna and every TV channel needed to rotate the antenna because of the multiple reflections from surrounding buildings. I decided to try this Yelaw. It is so good that it never needs rotating; it picks up every channel from one position. It even picks up Fox, which my previous antenna failed to get at all. Love this Yelaw.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: The antenna itself is very good so far
customer_reviews.text: The antenna itself is very good so far, the most channels we have been able to pick up (on a good) atmospherical day is 26, but we live on a mountain ridge 90 miles from the closest networks. The only real complaint is the remote, you have to be right on top of the remote box and the biggest complaint is the antenna does NOT turn in both directions unless you let it go to the far left or right position before it will turn the opposite direction, so fine tweaking is quite difficult. It was easy to set up and the directions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works okay but no way 150 miles! I live ...
customer_reviews.text: Update..I am taking away two stars...remote only seems to work when it wants to..and the signals seem to come in and out when they want? Works okay but no way 150 miles! I live about 60 miles from Cleveland and get get only two Cleveland stations. Does anyone know if you can use an antenna booster with this and which one?
customer_reviews.author: Pie47

customer_reviews.title: This antenna was perfect it is the best so far I've seen the ...
customer_reviews.text: This antenna was perfect it is the best so far I've seen the only bad thing is the motor for the remote or maybe it's the box I haven't found out yet stop working I'm not sure if it was because it was outside or if it's the Box inside but I'll have it tested find out maybe it's just something simple but I still even without the remote it picks up perfectly. I really like this product and I live up in the mountains period for me to pick up as many stations with this antenna I'm really surprised but it's great. I'm satisfied with it regardless of the remote control
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Picks up stations in the middle of nowhere
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved out to the middle of nowhere Northeast Texas: the nearest town is over an hour away. We're so far out, no cable or internet company will service our house so we figured we'd give this antenna a try. Our old 50 mile range indoor antenna didn't pick up anything, but this one picks up several channels! Not only that, but they are all completely clear and never lose connection! So happy we can finally watch tv again :)
customer_reviews.author: Travis Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: This one broke
customer_reviews.text: the rotational part of it will stay on and continue to spin causing the TV reception to go in and out... until eventually it gets stuck and then makes a loud clicking sound
customer_reviews.author: Christopher v.

customer_reviews.title: company has an awesome customer service department  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: when i received these, i had problems with them not working, and then when i did get it to work they never stopped spinning, and also getting too hot. when i called their rep. JON, he was very kind, and said that this company is working diligently to resolve the problems that these are having. i was also very impressed that even though this was an open box purchase, that they are standing behind these products and sending me a new one. i feel that this company and its reps, especially JON are striving to improve this antenna into the product that it could be. again i would like to thank JON, and wish him continued success.
customer_reviews.author: albert j.

customer_reviews.title: ... 10000A 150 mile UHF/VHF/FM Radio Amplified HDTV antenna works great the reception is crystal clear and the rotor helps ...
customer_reviews.text: The 10000A 150 mile UHF/VHF/FM Radio Amplified HDTV antenna works great the reception is crystal clear and the rotor helps fine tune distant channels. I am able to recieve 23 channel on the first try without doing and direction adjustments. Tech support is excellent. I highly recommend this antennae if your looking to cut the cord and get rid of Over priced Cable TV.
customer_reviews.author: thom01801

customer_reviews.title: Performance oriented.
customer_reviews.text: I installed on the side of the roof of my single floor house. So, not high at all. I used a 1X2 jnch stick tapered at one end for the U-bolt and screwed on the other end to a 2X4 block screwed to the side panel of the roof. Picture is crisp and clear, I rotated about a quarter way to get the channel I was targeting, channel 2. I got it and the others remained the same. The materials and not the most durable ones I think, but man the signal is way well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ouano

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Have used many different antennas and this one beats them all. Haven't had to turn it since I installed it on the roof and set it's direction. It brought in 20 extra channels crystal clear and it's signal is split to 5 TVs one of which runs more than 50 feet away. No signal loss due to it's spread. Keep in mind I live in the city! Make a purchase based on doing your homework and research based on your conditions. If you don't you may buy the wrong thing for your needs and then give something else a bad review because it didn't work for you. This goes for anything bought.
customer_reviews.author: michael opatrny

customer_reviews.title: So does the 'amplified' one do better.. NO
customer_reviews.text: I live in an outlying area and have little signals to get.. I have a plain antenna and both these get the same service..but the amplified one has to switched on.. forgetting that and it gets nothing..but I see no difference between the antennas and the signal they bring in.. So does the 'amplified' one do better.. NO..
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L. Bunker

customer_reviews.title: During the initial programming of my TV with this antenna ...
customer_reviews.text: During the initial programming of my TV with this antenna, over 50 channels were recognized but only 12-15 channels were made available for viewing. I realize that weather conditions have a lot to do with reception but the new antenna's performance is relatively the same as the antenna that I previously had been using. I think the 150 mile range of this antenna is slightly exaggerated as most of the channels that it received were under the 100 mile range. Other than that, the 8-10 channels that I am able to constantly view without any interference are very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it. I did install it on a 16' ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Since I cut the cable, I'm saving over 90.oo month. I back-fed the signal from the antenna to 3 TVs in my house and garage. I live in a mountainous area but still get 22 channels. Most very clear and sharp. I highly recommend it. I did install it on a 16' pole outside to gain max height.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Jennings Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this antenna to pick up local stations so I could get rid of my cable package. Having the ability to remotely tune in the stations has been very helpful. Customer service was great and responded very quickly to an email I sent them. I would recommend this antenna if your looking for an inexpensive over the air tv connection.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: This Atenna is great! I live in Los Angeles and this antenna ...
customer_reviews.text: This Atenna is great! I live in Los Angeles and this antenna picks up signals from San Diego! I had an issue that I caused myself I lost the Coaxal Connector while I was installing the DTV antenna. I contracted their customer service an they sent me a replacement free of charge. They have a 800 number and text messaging to make sure you are satisfied with their customer service, unlike most companies. So if your thinking about purchasing this antenna, once you get the antenna adjusted right for your area you will experience High Quality TV programming.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Antenna not as good as some of the flat antennas.
customer_reviews.text: Antenna installed in the third floor attic. I still get occasional pixelation from some of the over-the-air channels, particularly the PBS stations whose transmitter is less than 5 miles from my home. I installed the rotor controller next to the TV on the 1st floor but the wireless remote for the controller will not work when I try to adjust the antenna from the attic.
customer_reviews.author: A. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome antenna
customer_reviews.text: I have received this product in no time flat. On the same day with out hesitation I installed it due to I wanted TV there and then. It's a decent size antenna for the out side see I live in an apartment with where it's hard to get signal. With a 150 Mike range I thought it be perfect and I was correct. I received basically majority of the channels I can get for my area and I'm very HAPPY 🙌😎🙌😀😀 with the results. I do highly recommend it to all a must have and the price is on the spot. The images is beautiful on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Carrero

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: It works sort of, the built in connection cable to the TV is sub par at best. It’s thinner than a normal coaxial cable and is prone.to interference. The remote is badly made and I if you don’t aim it right at the IR receiver, it just does not work. Reception is not very good, and turning does little to fix this. Spend a little more and get a better antenna. Mine is going in the trash
customer_reviews.author: jakrob

customer_reviews.title: Good value work well
customer_reviews.text: This has been good I get 9 more channels. I am giving it 4 stars because the cable from the antenna to the box is it a regular coxale. it was long enough to go from my roof to my living. But had it not been not what where you get more or how to add cable to it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisr8406

customer_reviews.title: Best Antenna I Have Ever Purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as discribed. No problem with any of it. Have not even placed it on the roof and we recieve 30 channels. Can't wait to see what more comes up.
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE E. DORR

customer_reviews.title: Works Grrrr..... not
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 6 hours and now amplifier is dead. Contacted support and waiting to see how they respond. Will update my review when and if problem is resolved.Well I changed my rating from a 1 to a 3 because of the great customer service by Rocam and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job !
customer_reviews.text: TV Signals great. ROTOR bad, but customer service is sending me a replacement ASAP. Update: I will provide feedback after replacement sent. Update after replacement - Sweet ! Thank you Yelaw for replacement. First unit obviously defective. I use this for garage TV and FM Tuner via splitter. Went from 6 to 14 TV channels. My weak NPR FM channel is now crystal clear. Very happy now. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: raptorRunner

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup...pretty much plug and play...I didn't put it on the roof yet I just stuck it on a champagne bottle near the bedroom TV, then I did a scan and got 38 channels. so am very pleased with this antenna. I will put it on the roof soon and scan again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony CA

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting 75 channels from this antenna and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting 75 channels from this antenna and it is just 10 ft high. I would guess if I could find a way to install above the roof line (no obstruction ) I could get a few more stations.
customer_reviews.author: J. Estrella

customer_reviews.title: The rotary feature is almost useless since you can't tell where the antenna is positioned ...
customer_reviews.text: While the product worked I received 23 stations from one position. The rotary feature is almost useless since you can't tell where the antenna is positioned to and if you push the button to rotate it you don't know which direction it is turning. This morning I woke up to noise in the attic. I went up and saw the antenna turning and turning. It already ripped out the cord for the reception but the motor wire kept it turning until I unplugged it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Again

customer_reviews.title: Still working great!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a community far enough away that the smaller antennae’s would only bring in 1 channel. This one gets me at least 12 channels. I can only imagine how well it would be closer to a metropolitan city
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Works really good picked up a lot of stations 36+ miles away ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really good picked up a lot of stations 36+ miles away with mountain conditions. Still need to get it up 30 feet hoping that will get all the channels. not omni directional so pointing it directly at the correct direction is important.
customer_reviews.author: jamhi

customer_reviews.title: Do bother with this flimsy antenna.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 8 months. Did not hold up well in our weather and the amp/control unit lost its ability to amplify the signals. Changing my 4 star down to a 1 star. Stay away from this product. Not even worth the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with product and surprised how easy it was to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with product and surprised how easy it was to connect. I also was able to get around 20 channels in my area. The only problem was the motor on the antenna would not shut off. So I call a service man that is going to send me a new updated one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The rotating motor does not work correctly.
customer_reviews.text: It rotates round and round and round and never stops. I was sent a replacement and it does the same. It's too bad that this does not work as intended! Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable reception. Using it for FM only. Went from no reception to stations all the way across the dial.
customer_reviews.author: tommy cox

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase! Works great the first few months
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for 1 1/2 yr this antenna stopped working, the antenna starts spinning on its own like crazy and for this reason I can no longer get any channels. It worked great the first year but now it’s no good just a waste of money wouldn’t recommend it...I’m wondering if it has warranty
customer_reviews.author: ms951

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend, cuts in and out about every five seconds. Other than that works OK. Update, they have replace with a new one. Will see what happens. Follow-up: After receiving second replacement, not pleased with the antenna at all. Towers about 50 miles away. Works better without the amplifier and then about 3 networks channels. I have gotten close to 30 channels without it. Good luck if you buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Great antenna!
customer_reviews.text: Great antenna, I used it inside and was able to get a few more channels in clear than the smaller (mouse pad looking) antennas. I'm sure if I would place it outside and higher elevation it would work much better.
customer_reviews.author: hrb

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not the best antenna available. Does not work to pull in stations even 50 miles away.
customer_reviews.author: Eagleman

customer_reviews.title: Great Antenna.
customer_reviews.text: I am getting about 48 channels in northern virginia area with this antenna.you need a 1.25' mount to mount this antenna on roof or attic.your existing dish network or directv dish mount is not gonna work for this.
customer_reviews.author: J5ingh

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Easy to install. Good customer service from John.
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this product. There was a small problem, which was quickly resolved by John in customer service. All of my questions were answered and I was able to put this to good use. I am planning to purchase another antenna to use at another home. The customer service was easy to contact. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Fred B

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up we installed it on our boa ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up we installed it on our boa and I was getting 6 channels before this and now we have 22 registered and depending on the day can watch around 18 channels and sometimes 20 and a really clear day outside and proper aim and to do the that all you do is hold the button till it is pointing the way u need it
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Mackley

customer_reviews.title: Great reception from a range of 60-65 miles to broadcasters
customer_reviews.text: Great reception from a range of 60-65 miles to broadcasters. Just set it up indoors so anticipating much better reception once it's mounted outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Dufresne

customer_reviews.title: this is the best antenna i have seen in a long time instalation ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the best antenna i have seen in a long time instalation was easy, works great put antenna in middle of rotation and installed and did try scan and picked up 64 local channels did not have to rotate antenna at all, great price, great antenna, fast shipping came on date as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hack

customer_reviews.title: Antenna start malfunctioning after a month.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these, tried it out and it was great. Until it malfunctioned and started spinning randomly out of control. All the channels I got would cut in & out because it was spinning. Returned it for the same one. New one worked great as well, I got a lot of channels for about a month & a half. Until it started with the same problem. It spins non-stop, making it totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P. Moritz

customer_reviews.title: Came in nice and clear
customer_reviews.text: When antenna was connected got a lot of channels. Came in nice and clear. Only issue it continues to rotate when connected to amplifier. Seller is sending a new antenna. Will change to 5 star when I get replacement.
customer_reviews.author: yesenia

customer_reviews.title: It works, yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it doesn’t work. I have tried with different TVs but the antenna seems to be broken. It worked briefly and now it’s dead. UPDATE: I am updating my review to a five. The support is fantastic! I got a replacement for my first broken antenna and now I have a perfect working one. I am receiving twenty eight HD OTA channels from as far as 50 miles away.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me! Yeah the remote is a disappointment but there's a button on the unit. Still can turn the antenna from the ground. I love it?
customer_reviews.author: Brian Markus

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I picked up like 10 extra channels with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I picked up like 10 extra channels with this. I am going to order another to mount on a trailer! ill update when I do that!
customer_reviews.author: SuperDad1000

customer_reviews.title: Falls short on distance
customer_reviews.text: I live about 60 miles from two different large markets, I could barely receive one, I should have been able to get both.
customer_reviews.author: D&S Schelfhout

customer_reviews.title: Great reception in my attic
customer_reviews.text: Great reception in my attic where it is unobtrusive, which is what I wanted. This product was a very good value and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: harold2595

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great antenna, tried many differert version. Mounting to the room was the best with great unfiltered reception. Worth the money and the time spent installing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install-but helps if it noted -1inch mounting pole ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install-but helps if it noted -1inch mounting pole required. Worked great -mounted on eve of house in best position for ota towers-got 25 channels.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Randall

customer_reviews.title: 76 channels for FREE
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price. i have this unit mounted on my garage. the remote works great. The remote is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: the mike

customer_reviews.title: Great antenna
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed that such a small antenna could work so well. I live 100 miles NW of Orlando and 60 miles W of Daytona and yet I was able to receive 40 channels. It has a wide range so it doesn't have to be pointed right at the channel you want to watch. The picture was very clear. It was super simple to install. I would recommend this antenna to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: W. O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Works as should love it really good for price
customer_reviews.text: Works as said i love it free tv and its better outside on roof or on a poll but it does work inside just 60 channels put it outside get 100 plus!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup replacing an older type of digital antenna that cost twice as much. Plus this one has a good picture without any pixel disruption on all channels without having to do any adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Do it again
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Works awesome great price easy to install
customer_reviews.author: MrJeff73

customer_reviews.title: will not pick up 150 miles but still works good for the price
customer_reviews.text: will not pick up 150 miles but still works good for the price. I got stations about 65 miles away at best.
customer_reviews.author: MooMoo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! !!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not get as many channels as advertised. And the router brokeep the first time it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Amy crafts

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. Not every powerful, at least in my neighborhood in Westchester NY.
customer_reviews.author: mcamaj

customer_reviews.title: The Antenna actually gave me great TV reception
customer_reviews.text: The Antenna actually gave me great TV reception, I have to admit how well the amplifier works I was skeptical. Only drawback holding back 5 stars was the fact that for some reason I could not get any FM reception which I had to resolve separately.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: No, no, no.  Broken already
customer_reviews.text: Less than 30 days after installed, the system no longer works, power supply or box inop - no light lit, no signal. Not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Good for local channels, not for far away though
customer_reviews.text: Got local stations, not 150 miles away mind you, but no more digitized display, reception is always clear for the local channels now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, at least for the distances they claim. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Shaun J.

customer_reviews.title: Great antenna
customer_reviews.text: Great antenna for the price. The amplifier has two outputs so I was able to back feed additional TV's through the house's exiting coaxial wiring, with over 30 digital channels received 25+ miles out from the broadcast area. Installed in the attic and it works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This antenna receives more channels than my previous HD antenna. The farthest one is 50 miles away. I couldn't get the remote to work at first, John with their customer service was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: KCor

customer_reviews.title: Great To Finally Watch TV!
customer_reviews.text: Solved the problem of pulling in weak TV signals. Remote control works great to fine tune.
customer_reviews.author: Uptown J.

customer_reviews.title: Reception little improvement
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little bit more from this antenna, it is just a little bit better the in house one we already had.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: didn't work very well for me. will probably give it away if i can.
customer_reviews.author: SneakerBuster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I received over 40 channels and am about 30 minutes south of Atlanta, GA.
customer_reviews.author: M. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: some do better with it off
customer_reviews.text: My apartment doesn't face the ideal direction, but I still get the local ABC, NBC, CBS, Fox, PBS and a few misc. channels very clearly. Some need the boost on, some do better with it off.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this antenna, I have more channel options and it's easy to adjust
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Great antenna! Measured signal strength went from 3/10 with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great antenna! Measured signal strength went from 3/10 with old antenna to 9/10 with the Yelaw antenna. Easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: SBP

customer_reviews.title: Great product, little $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised how well this works for an inexpensive antenna. Everything works well. I made adjustment to antenna angle via power box button. That made a HUGE difference in reception just by moving it just a few degrees. Amazing! My only concern is I left plugged in while installing on house for 15 mins, yet the motor housing felt kind of warm. Hoping the power stays at a comfortable temp.
customer_reviews.author: Franscram

customer_reviews.title: Garbage cheap made !
customer_reviews.text: Motor burnt out in 6 months! No replacement because no longer available to replace. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: After a few weeks the antenna started spinning on its ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks the antenna started spinning on its own. Not really sure what to do about that so just unplugged it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Clear signal and more channels than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and easy to install. I am able to pick up 22 + stations from the US and Mexico. Signal is clear, equal to or better than dish or cable.
customer_reviews.author: gpa

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION : CATCHES FIRE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. The supplied power supply caught fire and filled my house with what smelled like an overheated capacitor. JUNK. And EXTREMELY dangerous. Definitely a cheap o from China. Do not buy .
customer_reviews.author: T. Quaresi

customer_reviews.title: Yep. It works.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I get PBS real good. All the other channels have nothing on them that I really care to watch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: it's cool to have along with streaming devices to cut the ...
customer_reviews.text: it's cool to have along with streaming devices to cut the cord. i have it inside on the lower level. haven't exposed it to top potential yet, but i will soon...
customer_reviews.author: Jam Jock

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few days
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when we first hooked it up but after a few days we lost local channels no matter which way we turned it. Unable to get reception from towers only 30 miles away. Was hoping to at least get those channels.
customer_reviews.author: Moms

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 month and is not even installed ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5 month and is not even installed outdoor, for the price I guess is an "ok" antenna
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo A. Santana

customer_reviews.title: “Cut the Cord” in Tampa,FL
customer_reviews.text: I live in Tampa, FL, I purchased this antenna because I “cut the cord” with my cable company. the antenna so far works great I received more channels than I thought I even could receive. Something like 20+ channels and all the local channels in great HD quality. I love the antenna so far and I would recommend it to anyone looking to “cut the cord”
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had the antenna professionally mounted to my roof. Only able to get 40-50 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked for less than a day than control box stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Chute

customer_reviews.title: It's a good antenna for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good antenna for the price. I didn't get 150 mile range, but it's better the my old antenna.
customer_reviews.author: mcflair33

customer_reviews.title: We received our antenna and it worked perfectly for 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: We received our antenna and it worked perfectly for 3 weeks and then it started rotating constantly on its own. I called the company for feedback and they are sending a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Jones

customer_reviews.title: dont hesitate..it does what it says
customer_reviews.text: cheap and works, no cable, heavily wooded 50+-120+ miles to any stations....went from 3 channels to 14
customer_reviews.author: RhondaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: cut the Cable and gain our hard earned $$$ back!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great range. This is the way we will get our local channels for FREE...While we cut the Cable and gain our hard earned $$$ back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tonilee m monteparte

customer_reviews.title: Great Antenna.
customer_reviews.text: Excelant antenna, I use it on my truck while over the road. I've pulled in anywhere from 75 to 126 channels depending on the town or city I'm in or near.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The motor has a remote to rotate the antenna and after a few days the motor started going crazy on its own. Now, if it's plugged in at all it is always rotating. This has made it unusable. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me. Don't know if it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Don't know if it is my location or the antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: FANTASIC antenna I can get 25 channels and Im in ...
customer_reviews.text: FANTASIC antenna I can get 25 channels and Im in a rural part of the country next to the Cascade Mts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does not seem to have a very long range
customer_reviews.author: dean thies

customer_reviews.title: BUT customer service was excellent, which is why i'm giving 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this antenna was not able to pick up the signal in my area (which is known for difficult reception due to its remote area (60 miles from 2 high transmission zones). BUT customer service was excellent, which is why i'm giving 5 stars. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and dont work....
customer_reviews.text: This was nothing more than a piece of junk and I'm being very honest about it. Never purchase this particular item unless you are buying expensive antennas.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie w

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three months.
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap. Worked for a couple months then something went wrong with device that turns the antenna and ripped the cable out of the antenna and there is no way to fix it. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Young

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: After moving to the South Platte River Valley, I was concerned about TV reception, but this antenna pulls in 28 channels consistently. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Batman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $36.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We are about 70 miles away from any station. Our other antenna we spent $100 on got 11 channels. We now receive 33 and we don’t need to rotate the antenna at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't pick up any more channels than the one I bought for $7 at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dadino

customer_reviews.title: Plastic junk
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dead wouldn’t rotate and pickup any channels. So very cheaply made wouldn’t last more than a couple months in the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sturgill
